topic.title: Chinese Game Streamer Was Suspected of Pedophilia and Women Insult
topic.body:
This is an article which is about a guy did some terrible things online.

please read the article!

And please spread out

Thanks a lotï¼

1544323909_18XCUzg18zdzeVbSNrvqRQ9cLn8Uq.body:
> [leftside](#comment_411_16dEowtNbV89NxPcDrAKkmnuXtiJVoVcDm): What's the point?

This guy caused vast negative impact to his fans and the society

> [2kclo3](#comment_1_18XCUzg18zdzeVbSNrvqRQ9cLn8Uqvmh47): This guy caused vast negative impact to his fans and the society

Thus, he must be forced out

> [leftside](#comment_411_16dEowtNbV89NxPcDrAKkmnuXtiJVoVcDm): What's the point?

Yet the website choose to protect him for his money-making ability
